name: Hydrate for Heaven
description:
A priest is overwhelmed by baptism requests during a global pandemic!!! It's up to you to gear up with your trusty Catholic water gun and spread the eternal love of Jesus while maintaining social distancing!!!

Controls:

WASD Keys -> Movement

Left Mouse Button -> Fire Water Gun

ESC Key -> Exit from Game

Credits:

Santiago Vega ->  Lead Programmer & Designer

Rox Follett -> 2D Artist

Katherine Drescher -> Illustrator
